title: Ticket #278: Resolve std/van inconsistencies in job policy evaluation
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

Dan does not have a fix for this in his patch set, but has taken the time to tabulate how actions triggered by job policy evaluation differ between standard and vanilla universe. The resulting table is included with the patch set.

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (27).
creator: gquinn
